name: Castle Drachenlich
description:
Created as part of the Toronto Game Jam 2020!

You have been dropped in the middle of the Mad Wizard Drachenlich's castle.

Other adventurers have tried and failed before you, the only reminders of their struggles hastily crafted maps.

Trapped in the  maze-like corridors of the castle's dungeon, seek the portal that leads to freedom! 

C O N T R O L S

M O V E M E N Tkeyboardmouse


N O T E S and T O D O 

  • As of this build, we consider the presentation of the game complete
  • The only aspect not entirely in place (ironically what kickstarted this idea) was the ability to discover other players' maps who tried and failed to escape--while the backend is ready, we couldn't finish connecting it to the minimap proper where players would leave markers and warnings.
